statements: UPDATE system_activity_log SET action_taken = 'User logged in' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE system_activity_log SET timestamp = '2022-01-05 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE system_activity_log SET user_id = 100, action_taken = 'Login' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE system_activity_log SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, user_id = 200 WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE system_activities SET activity_type = 'Logged In', timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00', activity_description = 'User logged in successfully' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'Password Change', timestamp = '2022-09-16 10:45:00' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE system_activities SET activity_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'Modified action', timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE system_activities SET activity_description='Updated activity description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type='Updated action type', action_description='New action description' WHERE user_id=3;
UPDATE system_activities SET activity_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_description = 'User action updated', timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 100 AND action_type = 'Login';
UPDATE SystemActivityLog SET action_type = 'Login' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE UserActionLog SET timestamp = '2021-08-15 12:30:00' WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE SystemActivityLog SET action_type = 'Login Success' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE UserFeedback SET feedback = 'Great job on the new feature!' WHERE user_id = 456 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE system_activities SET activity_description = 'Updated activity description' WHERE activity_id = 1;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'Modified action type', action_description = 'New action description' WHERE action_id = 5;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_description = 'Updated action description' WHERE action_id = 10;
UPDATE knowledge_base SET article_content = 'New article content', last_modified_timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE article_id = 25;
